newsitem.title: USA: Nabisco names new pres of Nabisco Int'l unit.
newsitem.headline: Nabisco names new pres of Nabisco Int'l unit.

text.p: Nabisco Inc said Thursday it named Christopher Coughlin president of its international manufacturing and marketing unit, Nabisco International.
He succeeds Charles Lieppe, who has left the company, Nabisco said.
In his new position, Coughlin, 45, will oversee Nabisco's international businesses in Latin America, Europe, the Middle East and Asia, Nabisco said.
Previously Coughlin served as chief financial officer of Nabisco Inc.
Coughlin joined Nabisco last April from Sterling Winthrop, a pharmaceutical and consumer health company, where he had been chief financial officer and a member of the board of directors.
